channel.title: free on Vinod Kurup
channel.description: Recent content in free on Vinod Kurup

item.title: Free Telephone Service
item.description: Has anyone tried any of the Internet phone services? Skype looks very interesting. Nice interface, lots of platforms, high praise from people I trust, and most importantly, it’s FREE! Well, as long as the person you’re calling also has Skype. If you want to call a real phone, you buy credits (which seem pretty cheap). Lemme know if any of you try it out… Comments from old site Skype is cool

item.title: Legal Music Download
item.description: Legal Music Downloads and some great background information. I’m gonna give iRATE a try. Comments from old site Directory of Legal Music Downloads Check out this site for a comprehensive listing of legal music download sites. Directory of Legal Music Downloads Joel Erenberg 2004-04-11 19:18:06

item.title: Don't get sued
item.description: The topic of music sharing and its legality came up during our annual cousins trip in Seattle. Here’s an important article on How Not to Get Sued by the RIAA. The most important thing is the last line in the article: Join EFF and support our efforts to protect file-sharing. I don’t use P2P music-sharing apps anymore. While I love the idea of being able to access an unending library of music, I don’t like the idea of getting it for free.
